data.actual_result: It freezes for a while, and then returns to normal. The icon doesn't change.
data.expected_result: Website bashes you for uploading weird files.
data.short_description: Uploading a video to app icon causes website to freeze and lag a lot. Windows only for freezing part.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to developer portal. - Go to any application. - Upload app icon. - Windows: Choose all files in file type filter and choose any video. - OS X: Click options, change format: custom files to all files.
